Package index

Boundaries

These functions return sf objects with political boundaries.

gb_get()
Get individual country files from geoBoundaries
gb_get_adm0() gb_get_adm1() gb_get_adm2() gb_get_adm3() gb_get_adm4() gb_get_adm5()
Get country files from geoBoundaries for a given administration level
gb_get_world()
Get global composites data (CGAZ) from geoBoundaries

Metadata

These functions return metadata in tibble format.

gb_get_max_adm_lvl()
Get the highest administrative level available for a given country
gb_get_metadata()
Get metadata of individual country files from geoBoundaries

Cache management

gb_set_cache() gb_get_cache() gb_list_cache() gb_clear_cache() gb_delete_from_cache()
rgeoboundaries cache utilities

About the package

rgeoboundaries rgeoboundaries-package
rgeoboundaries: A Client for the 'geoBoundaries' Administrative Boundaries Dataset

Deprecated functions

geoboundaries() gb_adm0() gb_adm1() gb_adm2() gb_adm3() gb_adm4() gb_adm5() gb_metadata() gb_max_adm_lvl() deprecated
Deprecated and renamed functions in rgeoboundaries
